page.title: 12Chatsworth Farmyard
page.content: The Farmyard and Adventure Playground is open from the end of March to the end of September and is a very busy place during this time. The Farmyard has a large selection of animals including cattle, sheep, pigs, poultry, horses etc. Many schoolchildren come in the Spring and Summer to see the newly born piglets and lambs and the active bee hive. There are many breeds of poultry and some wander around the yards with you. The milking demonstration at 3.30pm each day gives you an insight into where your daily milk comes from. The Adventure Playground tests the physical skills of all ages with a commando slide, tree-houses, scramble nets, ropes, poles, swings and a secret tunnel.
